medium: Pen and ink and watercolor on card
title: Untitled [sleeping fisherman with three elves]
description: seated man, sleeping, wearing a bowler hat and smoking a pipe, fishing off of a steep bank; robin stealing worms out of can next to man; three elves peek around tree against which man leans; painted on heavy board with cover sheet pasted to back at top edge
creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
